summary: After being repeatedly denied her requests for a vacation by her sexist boss, a young woman finally explodes.
cast: Dora Polic|Ivan Brkic|Milan Strljic|Nina Violic|Vera Zima|Hana Hegedusic|Mirjana Rogina|Danko Ljustina|Anita Diaz|Marija Kohn|Vlasta Knezovic|Branko Menicanin|Vlatko Dulic|Drago Diklic|Vid Balog|Zvonimir Juric|Ana Klabucar|Bojan Navojec|Rakan Rushaidat|Marija Skaricic|Marko Svagusa|Zoran Tadic
title: Blagajnica hoce ici na more
